BackstoryDef.title: innocent irregular
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived [PAWN_possessive] whole life in a cave, [PAWN_possessive] sole friend was a blond girl with golden eyes. [PAWN_pronoun] adored her like a sister, a mother or something stronger. One day, following her in a big and dark tower, in front of the abyss she pushed [PAWN_objective] inside. [PAWN_nameDef] mysteriously survived this treason.

BackstoryDef.title: red tower
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has opened a new path in the tower with a power unknown before. [PAWN_nameDef] is capable of achieving feats thought to be impossible. [PAWN_pronoun] is a force of divine nature, an envoy from the all mighty and has already proven himself.

BackstoryDef.title: vice head of the wolhaiksong
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has strength and speed that defy all logic with which [PAWN_pronoun] defied rules and human bonds. [PAWN_pronoun] proved that [PAWN_pronoun] is capable, not only as a fighter, but also as a leader and a worldwide figure. [PAWN_nameDef] still trusts more in [PAWN_possessive] fists than anything else.
